name: SPACE EXODUS
description:
Rise and shine, pilot. In Space EXODUS you take control of various gliders to defeat your enemies. Pirates from all parts of space are attacking our earth and you are our last chance to stop them. So rise to the challenge.

Gameplay

Fight with agile gliders and a variety of weapons.
Equip your glider according to your wishes and destroy your enemies mercilessly.
Besides the gliders, you can also take control of a giant cruiser. And with even more fire power you can stop your enemies.
Or sit at a stationary gun and fight your enemies from the ground.

Whichever you choose. It's your fight!


SPACE EXODUS uses the Unity Engine to create a credible universe.
